Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.Utility.DebuggingTools

Class Debugger

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.Utility.DebuggingTools.Debugger
Direct Known Subclasses:
CliControllerDebugger, CliDebugger, ClientConnectionDebugger, ClientDebugger, ControllerDebugger, ModelDebugger, ServerConnectionDebugger, ServerDebugger, ServerMessageHandlerDebugger
public abstract class Debugger
extends java.lang.Object
Debugger Class defines common data and methods used to print debugging information. All attributes are static because they are shared between all Debuggers.

Attributes:

  • boolean "allActive": used to activate or deactivate all Debuggers at once
  • String "R": contains ANSI escape code needed to reset color and fonts
